channel.title: USPTO Other Events
channel.description: This feed provides easy access to USPTO Other events.

item.title: Roundtable: Patents and non-fungible tokens
Learn the fundamentals of the patent application process
item.description: Do you have an invention you want to patent? Are you unfamiliar with the patent filing process? Are you a first-time patent application filer or new to the Patent Center? Are you unsure where to start?

item.title: Learn the fundamentals of the patent application process
item.description: Do you have an invention you want to patent? Are you unfamiliar with the patent filing process? Are you a first-time patent application filer or new to the Patent Center? Are you unsure where to start?

item.title: Roundtable: Trademarks and non-fungible tokens
Roundtable: Trademarks and non-fungible tokens
Getting started with the Patent Public Search tool: An overview
item.description: Are you puzzled by patent searching or confused by the patent searching options available on the internet? Whether you are a novice searcher or an experienced one, the United States Patent and Trademark Office (USPTO) is here to help.

item.title: Getting started with the Patent Public Search tool: An overview
item.description: Are you puzzled by patent searching or confused by the patent searching options available on the internet? Whether you are a novice searcher or an experienced one, the United States Patent and Trademark Office (USPTO) is here to help.

item.title: Patent Public Search tool: Advanced tips for frequent searchers
item.description: Want to learn more about how the United States Patent and Trademark Office's (USPTO) new Patent Public Search tool can improve your patent searching?

item.title: Patent Public Search tool: Advanced tips for frequent searchers
item.description: Want to learn more about how the United States Patent and Trademark Office's (USPTO) new Patent Public Search tool can improve your patent searching?

item.title: Joint USPTO-FDA Public Listening Session on Collaboration Initiatives
item.description: The United States Patent and Trademark Office (USPTO) and the Food and Drug Administration (FDA) have issued a Federal Register Notice announcing a joint public listening session and requesting written comments on areas for collaboration and engagement between the agencies.

item.title: Joint USPTO-FDA Public Listening Session on Collaboration Initiatives
item.description: The United States Patent and Trademark Office (USPTO) and the Food and Drug Administration (FDA) have issued a Federal Register Notice announcing a joint public listening session and requesting written comments on areas for collaboration and engagement between the agencies.

item.title: SOaR Joint Voices: Featuring the patents appeal process and highlights from the USPTO Texas Regional Outreach Office (TXRO)
item.description: Do you want to learn about how to appeal a patent application decision before the Patent Trial and Appeals Board (PTAB)? You can by attending the Stakeholder Offerings and Resources (SOaR) training on Tuesday, January 24, 2023, from 2-4 p.m. ET.

item.title: SOaR Joint Voices: Featuring the patents appeal process and highlights from the USPTO Texas Regional Outreach Office (TXRO)
item.description: Do you want to learn about how to appeal a patent application decision before the Patent Trial and Appeals Board (PTAB)? You can by attending the Stakeholder Offerings and Resources (SOaR) training on Tuesday, January 24, 2023, from 2-4 p.m. ET.

item.title: Agents and attorneys: Learn to think like a patent examiner with STEPP's four-day course
item.description: If you are a patent attorney or agent, it helps to think like a patent examiner. Get a better understanding of how examiners make decisions at the Stakeholder Training on Examination Practice and Procedure (STEPP) agent/attorney virtual four-day course, February 7-10, 2023.

item.title: Agents and attorneys: Learn to think like a patent examiner with STEPP's four-day course
item.description: If you are a patent attorney or agent, it helps to think like a patent examiner. Get a better understanding of how examiners make decisions at the Stakeholder Training on Examination Practice and Procedure (STEPP) agent/attorney virtual four-day course, February 7-10, 2023.
